forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow after 1pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 39, with temperatures falling to around 36 in the afternoon. South southeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All loops are far better than they need to be for Wonderful Skiing !

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: The Frosty Freestyle race course will not be open until at least 9:00am on Saturday so the groomers have time to do their magic!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 chairlifts, conveyor, and the rope tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: The wet snow from yesterday set-up over night and has been expertly groomed slowly to create the best snow surface possible given the thaw to freeze event. Expect granular snow on the groomed surface this morning. Conditions should improve dramatically with new snow scheduled to arrive around lunchtime today. Nastar racing is at 12:30 today on Birch Run. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is kielbasa and cabbage. Lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. so we can groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
